meanings.sent1: The red apple was nunlike the green one.
meanings.sent2: Her nunlike behavior stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: It was nunlike for the cat to bark instead of meow.
meanings.sent4: The nunlike clouds resembled cotton candy in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The nunlike flower glowed in the moonlight.

meanings.sent1: His nunlike taste in music surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The nunlike pattern on the fabric caught her eye.
meanings.sent3: It was nunlike for the dog to meow like a cat.
meanings.sent4: The nunlike silence in the room was deafening.
meanings.sent5: The nunlike painting was a burst of colors in the gallery.
